title: Dolmen of Guadalperal
description: A megalithic stone circle dating to the third millennium BCE located in Peraleda de la Mata in eastern Extremadura, Spain. The monument is usually submerged beneath the waters of the Embalse de Valdeca√±as, a reservoir of the Tagus river.
